subject: NCAA Basketball Championships (Men)
Basketball (College)
lead_paragraph: The Long Island University super fan Richard Kurlander, who has been blind since birth, never misses a Blackbirds game, either in person or on the radio or Internet.
snippet: The Long Island University super fan Richard Kurlander, who has been blind since birth, never misses a Blackbirds game, either in person or on the radio or Internet.
